AUTHORIZED_USERS.description: List of Authorized Users who can control this bot (Separate with spaces)

APP_ID.description: App ID of your telegram account (my.telegram.org)

API_HASH.description: API Hash of your telegram account (my.telegram.org)

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID where you want to log error messages of bot (Optional)

REQUIRED_CHAT_TO_JOIN.description: Chat Id/username of channels/groups where you want your users to be joined to get files [Separate in spaces] (Optional)

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Message which will be sent by bot on using /start command (Optional)
